Reviews.Content: Hotel is good The hotel staff are helpful. Breakfast is okay but the room is clean.I would recommend this hotel to anyone...the only thing I had problem is the heat...the room is so hot and I tried to turn on AC, apparently, the heater and AC is centralized.
Reviews.Author: Sorsue

Reviews.Content: Good location, but very noisy Good location for this hotel. Within walking distance from museums. Staff is very helpfull and charming.Noise is terrible. Paper thin walls.
Reviews.Author: arsenal7533
